data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rheims, Cristina Anne (2017): A new species of Decaphora Franganillo, 1931 (Araneae, Sparassidae, Sparianthinae) from Colombia, with an identification key for all known species of the genus. Zootaxa 4323 (3): 435-439, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4323.3.11|1 occurrence
